channel.title: Introduction :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Before we delve too deeply into how to reason about Object-Orientation and how to utilize it in your programming efforts, it would be useful to understand why object-orientation came to exist. This initial chapter seeks to explore the origins behind object-oriented programming. Key Terms Some key terms to learn in this chapter are: The Software Crisis GOTO statements Programming Language Paradigm Imperative Programming Functional Programming Structured Programming Object-Orientation
